languages.text: Даргонус рос и креп, превращаясь в столицу Простора Коронус. Вбирая сокровища и пороки сектора, мир был подобен гигантскому магниту, чья тяга удерживала все миры Простора.

Dargonus grew and prospered until it became the capital of the Koronus Expanse. The planet was like a giant magnet whose pull held together the worlds of the Expanse, absorbing the treasures and vices of the sector.
languages.original_text: Даргонус рос и креп, превращаясь в столицу Простора Коронус. Вбирая сокровища и пороки сектора, мир был подобен гигантскому магниту, чья тяга удерживала все миры Простора.

traits.locale_text: Dargonus grew and prospered until it became the capital of the Koronus Expanse. The planet was like a giant magnet whose pull held together the worlds of the Expanse, absorbing the treasures and vices of the sector.

Dargonus grew and prospered until it became the capital of the Koronus Expanse. The planet was like a giant magnet whose pull held together the worlds of the Expanse, absorbing the treasures and vices of the sector.

languages.text: 达戈努斯不断壮大，日益繁荣，最终成为了整个科罗努斯扩区的首都。这颗行星就像一块巨大的磁铁，将科罗努斯扩区所有世界吸引到了一起，吸收着这片星区的所有财富与罪恶。
languages.original_text: Dargonus grew and prospered until it became the capital of the Koronus Expanse. The planet was like a giant magnet whose pull held together the worlds of the Expanse, absorbing the treasures and vices of the sector.

traits.locale_text: 达戈努斯不断壮大，日益繁荣，最终成为了整个科罗努斯扩区的首都。这颗行星就像一块巨大的磁铁，将科罗努斯扩区所有世界吸引到了一起，吸收着这片星区的所有财富与罪恶。

languages.text: ダルゴナスは発展、繁栄し、遂にはコロヌス・エクスパンスの首都になった。この惑星は巨大な磁石のようで、その引力がエクスパンスを纏め、星域の財宝と悪行を吸い上げていた。
languages.original_text: Dargonus grew and prospered until it became the capital of the Koronus Expanse. The planet was like a giant magnet whose pull held together the worlds of the Expanse, absorbing the treasures and vices of the sector.

traits.locale_text: ダルゴナスは発展、繁栄し、遂にはコロヌス・エクスパンスの首都になった。この惑星は巨大な磁石のようで、その引力がエクスパンスを纏め、星域の財宝と悪行を吸い上げていた。

languages.text: Dargonus se développa et prospéra jusqu'à devenir la capitale des Étendues de Koronus. La planète était comme un aimant géant dont le pouvoir d'attraction maintenait la cohésion des mondes des Étendues, en absorbant les trésors et les vices du secteur.
languages.original_text: Dargonus grew and prospered until it became the capital of the Koronus Expanse. The planet was like a giant magnet whose pull held together the worlds of the Expanse, absorbing the treasures and vices of the sector.

traits.locale_text: Dargonus se développa et prospéra jusqu'à devenir la capitale des Étendues de Koronus. La planète était comme un aimant géant dont le pouvoir d'attraction maintenait la cohésion des mondes des Étendues, en absorbant les trésors et les vices du secteur.

languages.text: Dargonus creció y prosperó hasta convertirse en la capital de la Extensión de Koronus. El planeta era como un imán gigante cuya fuerza de atracción mantenía unidos a los mundos de la Extensión, absorbiendo tanto los tesoros como los vicios del sector.
languages.original_text: Dargonus grew and prospered until it became the capital of the Koronus Expanse. The planet was like a giant magnet whose pull held together the worlds of the Expanse, absorbing the treasures and vices of the sector.

traits.locale_text: Dargonus creció y prosperó hasta convertirse en la capital de la Extensión de Koronus. El planeta era como un imán gigante cuya fuerza de atracción mantenía unidos a los mundos de la Extensión, absorbiendo tanto los tesoros como los vicios del sector.

languages.text: Dargonus wuchs und gedieh und wurde zur Hauptwelt der Koronus-Ausdehnung. Der Planet war wie ein gigantischer Magnet, der die Welten der Ausdehnung zusammenhielt und die Schätze und Laster des Sektors vereinnahmte.
languages.original_text: Dargonus grew and prospered until it became the capital of the Koronus Expanse. The planet was like a giant magnet whose pull held together the worlds of the Expanse, absorbing the treasures and vices of the sector.

traits.locale_text: Dargonus wuchs und gedieh und wurde zur Hauptwelt der Koronus-Ausdehnung. Der Planet war wie ein gigantischer Magnet, der die Welten der Ausdehnung zusammenhielt und die Schätze und Laster des Sektors vereinnahmte.

languages.text: Dargonus büyüdü, gelişti ve nihayetinde Koronus Enginliği'nin başdünyası oldu. Çekimi Enginlik'teki tüm dünyaları bir arada tutan dev bir mıknatıs gibi olan gezegen, sektördeki tüm hazineleri ve kötülükleri kendisine çekti.
languages.original_text: Dargonus grew and prospered until it became the capital of the Koronus Expanse. The planet was like a giant magnet whose pull held together the worlds of the Expanse, absorbing the treasures and vices of the sector.

traits.locale_text: Dargonus büyüdü, gelişti ve nihayetinde Koronus Enginliği'nin başdünyası hâline geldi. Gezegen, çekimi Enginlik'teki tüm dünyaları bir arada tutan dev bir mıknatıs gibiydi ve sektördeki tüm hazineleri ve bozuklukları kendisine çekti.
